nodes.text: Spudwee was was one of the Twi'lek freedom fighters that were led by Cham Syndulla during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, Spudwee was one of the Twi'leks that were massacred by the CIS forces during the initial stages of the Battle of Ryloth. After their death, Spudwee was among the freedom fighters that were buried in a graveyard on their homeworld. Spudwee's name was inscribed in Aurebesh on the gravestone.
